contentfulBlogPost.title: MP Shaun Chen’s Canada Day Weekend Giveaway

content.value: On July 3, 2021, the Blankets for T.O. team volunteered at Member of Parliament Shaun Chen’s Canada Day event, where 1,000 giveaway bags were distributed to the residents of Scarborough North. Days prior to the event, we helped to package the giveaway bags which included items like medical face masks, disinfecting wipes, a t-shirt, a bottle of hand sanitizer, a toy, various food items, and Canada Day merchandise. Our team assisted in transporting the bags to the site at the parking lot of Woodside Square and set up the area for the drive-thru event. We had lots of fun helping to direct traffic and handing out the giveaway bags to attendees!

title.en-US: Blankets for T.O. at MP Shaun Chen's Canada Day Weekend Giveaway Drive-Thru

description.en-US: Members of the Blankets for T.O. team with MP Shaun Chen, during his Canada Day Weekend Giveaway Drive-Thru on July 3rd, 2021.

content.value: Despite the long hours of preparation and being outside in the hot weather, it was undoubtedly a humbling experience for us and all the other helpers. We were able to celebrate Canada Day together and connect with the community while supporting them during these tough times.

This event was my first volunteer experience which involved such a large number of people. Putting a smile on everyone’s face was extremely worthwhile and helped to reinforce my sense of purpose. I can certainly say that this event has stimulated my enthusiasm to participate in future community-driven initiatives, no matter how big or small my contribution may be.
Mei Ling, Director of Finance at Blankets for T.O.

At Blankets for T.O., we are always grateful for opportunities to help out the community in any way that we can. A big thank you to MP Shaun Chen and his team for organizing this great event and to everyone who showed up!

node.title: Care Packages complete, MP Shaun Chen honours Blankets for T.O.

childMarkdownRemark.html: During the Blankets for T.O. Care Package Event we gathered essential items to create personalized Care Package bags and donated them to local shelters. We also received a visit and a certificate from Member of Parliament Shaun Chen!

We collaborate with Water.org to provide students with opportunities to socialize with friends, win prizes in games and raffles, and become better informed about homelessness in Toronto and water scarcity around the world.
